Deprecated API

Deprecated Classes
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZSelectionEventHandler
          This class has been replaced by ZSelectionDeleteHandler, ZSelectionModifyHandler, ZSelectionMoveHandler, and ZSelectionScaleHandler 
 

Deprecated Methods
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSceneGraphObject.fireMouseEvent(ZMouseEvent)
          as of Jazz 1.1 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.io.ASCII_UCodeESC_CharStream.getColumn()
            
edu.umd.cs.jazz.component.ZBasicVisualComponent.getFillColor()
          As of Jazz version 1.1, replaced by ZFillPaint.getFillPaint(). 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.util.ZSceneGraphEditor.getGroups()
          as of Jazz 1.1 editorIterator() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.io.ASCII_UCodeESC_CharStream.getLine()
            
edu.umd.cs.jazz.component.ZBasicVisualComponent.getPenColor()
          As of Jazz version 1.1, replaced by ZPenPaint.getPenPaint(). 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.getSelectedNodes(ZCamera)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.getSelectedNodes(ZCamera) 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.getSelectedNodes(ZNode)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.getSelectedNodes(ZNode) 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.isSelected(ZNode)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.isSelected(ZNode) 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZGroup.iterator()
          use getChildrenIterator() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.select(ZNode)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.select(ZNode) 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.component.ZBasicVisualComponent.setPenColor(Color)
          As of Jazz version 1.1, replaced by ZPenPaint.setPenPaint(Paint aPaint). 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.unselect(ZNode)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.unselect(ZNode) 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.unselectAll(ZCamera)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.unselectAll(ZCamera) 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.ZSelectionGroup.unselectAll(ZNode)
          as of Jazz 1.1, replaced by ZSelectionManager.unselectAll(ZNode) 
 

Deprecated Constructors
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZCameraEvent(ZCamera, int, AffineTransform)
          as of Jazz 1.1, use createViewChangedEvent() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZGroupEvent(ZGroup, int, ZNode, boolean)
          as of Jazz 1.1, use createNodeAddedEvent() or createNodeRemovedEvent() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZMouseEvent(int, MouseEvent, ZSceneGraphPath, ZSceneGraphPath)
          as of Jazz 1.1, use createMouseEvent() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZMouseEvent(int, ZNode, MouseEvent, ZSceneGraphPath)
          as of Jazz 1.1, use createMouseEvent() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZNodeEvent(ZNode, int)
          as of Jazz 1.1, use createBoundsChangedEvent() or createGlobalBoundsChanged() instead. 
edu.umd.cs.jazz.event.ZTransformEvent(ZTransformGroup, int, AffineTransform)
          as of Jazz 1.1, use createTransfomrChangedEvent() instead.
